AIBS's Official Cultural & Events Page 
Amity International Business School (AIBS)

latestPosts.caption:
🌍 Ready to take on the world?
The future belongs to those who think beyond borders. 💼✈️

Join the BBA – International Business program at Amity International Business School, where you’ll:
✅ Master global trade
✅ Learn from real-world case studies
✅ Build a career without boundaries

📚 Dive into subjects like:
🔹 Import–Export Procedures
🔹 International Financial Management
🔹 Cross-Cultural Management
🔹 International Marketing Strategy
🔹 Global Negotiations & E-commerce
🔹 Foreign Trade Practices

📍 Visit us at Amity University, Noida or explore more on our website.

💡 #ThinkGlobal #BBAInternationalBusiness #Amity #GlobalCareers #StudyAtAmity #FutureReady #InternationalTrade #CrossCulturalLeadership#aibs

latestPosts.caption:
🚀 Ready to grow your online presence?
We’ve got you covered!

✨ Join our BBA Digital Marketing program at Amity International Business School — where you’ll master:
💻 Social Media Marketing
✍️ Content Creation
👑 Luxury Brand Marketing
🤝 B2B Marketing
🤖 AI in Marketing
…and so much more!

📍 Visit our website or drop by our campus at Amity University Noida.
🌐 Your digital journey starts here!

#DigitalMarketing #BBA #bbaadmission #BBADigitalMarketing #AmityUniversity #AmityNoida #MarketingDegree #SocialMediaMarketing #ContentCreation #LuxuryMarketing #B2BMarketing #AIInMarketing #FutureMarketers #MarketingStudents #DigitalFuture #StudyAtAmity #MarketingGoals

🚀 Ready to lead the future of global business?
Step into the cutting-edge world of Business Intelligence & Data Analytics with the BBA BIDA program at Amity International Business School.

💡 We integrated International Business + AI + Emerging Tech 10 years ago — while others are just catching up.

🌍 Learn from global experts through short-term study abroad programs
🎓 Be mentored by renowned academicians & industry leaders
🔍 Designed for the next-gen business analyst
📥 Admissions Open – Apply now & lead tomorrow

📲 Visit our website to know more.
#BBA #BIDA #AIinBusiness #AmityUniversity #StudyAbroad #FutureLeader #GlobalBusiness #DataAnalytics #BusinessIntelligence #NextGenEducation

🚀 Admissions Open!
BBA IBAI – International Business with Artificial Intelligence
🌍 Master global trade + 💡 AI innovation
🎓 Choose from:
• 3-Year BBA IBAI
• 4-Year Honours with Research
• 3-Continents Global Program

🔗 Explore Now: https://amity.edu/aibs/bbaibai/
📞 Enroll Today: +91-12043930
#AmityUniversity #BBAIBAI #AIinBusiness #GlobalBusiness #AdmissionsOpen #StudyWithAmity

latestPosts.caption:
Dreaming of studying abroad but stuck with visa delays? 🌍✈️
Start your global journey right here in India with Amity’s Global Study Programs – and transfer to your dream university abroad later!
✅ International faculty
✅ Global exposure
✅ Flexible credit transfer
✅ Full visa support
✅ 75% cost savings

Your study abroad dream is still possible – start now, go global later! 🌐📚

#AmityUniversity #StudyAbroad #GlobalEducation #VisaSupport #FutureReady #AtulChauhan #GlobalStudy #StartHereGoAnywhere

Study Abroad Program France 🇫🇷
Our study abroad program in France was an unforgettable experience that combined academic excellence with cultural immersion. We had a blast exploring new countries, cuisines, and perspectives, while our professor's expertise made the study sessions informative and engaging. Through collaborative group work, we not only gained knowledge but also developed into global citizens, equipped to navigate diverse environments and cultures.Grateful for the memories, friendships, and growth that this experience has brought. 

(France, Explore France, Amity University)

#StudyAbroad #France #GlobalCitizens #CulturalImmersion #AcademicExcellence
#amityuniversity

Proud moment as Amity students embark on their Study Abroad Program in France expanding global perspectives, embracing diverse cultures, and enhancing academic excellence. 🌍🇫🇷 #AmityUniversity #StudyAbroadProgram #SAPFrance #GlobalLearning #InternationalEducation #FutureLeaders #CulturalExchange #AcademicExcellence #AmityGoesGlobal

Mr. Prateek Dubey, an alumnus of Amity International Business School, who is now a renowned entrepreneur and angel investor shares how the international exposure, holistic resources and global curriculum empowered him to thrive in the professional world globally.

Be inspired by his journey from AIBS to global opportunities—and imagine where your journey could begin.

#AmityUniversity#AIBS#DualDegree #3ContinentProgram #AmityInternationalPrograms #StudyAbroad #GlobalCareers #Admissions2025 #LifeAtAmity #Mentor #futureleaders

📊 BBA in Business Intelligence & Data Analytics @ Amity International Business School
🚀 Unlock the power of data to drive smart business decisions!

🌐 Interdisciplinary learning
💼 Real-world exposure through internships & projects
📈 Master tools in analytics, visualization & strategy
🧠 Dive into AI, ML, IoT & more!

From fundamentals to futuristic tech, our 6-semester curriculum prepares you for the world of tomorrow.
💬 Learn. Analyze. Lead. 🌍

📞 +91-120-4393043
🔗 Visit: amity.edu/aibs
📥 ENROLL NOW
